import React, {useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/input.css' const Edit = ({post}) => { const {postId, title, content} = post const [titlePost, setTitlePost] = useState("") const [contentPost, setContentPost] = useState("") const handleSubmit = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() const body = { id: postId, title: titlePost, content: contentPost } await fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL_DEVELOPMENT + '/edit-post',{ method: 'POST', mode: 'cors', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify(body) }) } return (

setTitlePost(e.target.value) }/>
